snippet: Video uploaded to YouTube on Thursday showed civilians’ being cut down by gunfire on Wednesday in Cairo during an assault by security forces.
abstract: Video uploaded to YouTube on Thursday showed civilians’ being cut down by gunfire on Wednesday in Cairo during an assault by security forces.

byline.original: By ROBERT MACKEY and LIAM STACK

headline.main: Video Shows Civilians Gunned Down in Cairo
